/* REQUIREMENTS (1) Create Status Disease Progression on Progression tab (Status table); (2) Add ability to Disease Progression to Protocol Admin/Timeline; (3) Hide AA (1) and AA(2) visits scheduled after Progression date for Arm 1; Hide all visits (C, AA (2)) after Progression date for Arm 2 */ SELECT DISTINCT --* --a.ProtocolId, --a.PatientId, --a.PatientProtocolId, -- patient item info a.ItemTimelineId, a.PatientSchemaId, a.PatientItemId, a.ScheduledDate, a.FirstAnticipatedDate, a.LastAnticipatedDate, a.Status FROM -- get patient schedule ( SELECT DISTINCT p.ProtocolId, pp.PatientId, pp.PatientProtocolId, ps.PatientSchemaId, ps.ProtocolSchemaId, ps.ProtocolArmDescription, t.TimelineId, t.VisitLabel, pi.PatientItemId, pi.ItemTimelineId, pi.ScheduledDate, pi.FirstAnticipatedDate, pi.LastAnticipatedDate, pi.Status FROM PatientProtocols pp INNER JOIN Protocols p ON pp.ProtocolId = p.ProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.ProtocolId, b.ProtocolSchemaId, b.ProtocolArmDescription, a.PatientId, a.PatientSchemaId FROM ProtocolMgr_PatientSchemas a INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas b ON a.ProtocolSchemaId = b.ProtocolSchemaId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolVersions c ON b.ProtocolVersionId = c.ProtocolVersionId ) ps ON pp.ProtocolId = ps.ProtocolId AND pp.PatientId = ps.PatientId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_PatientItems pi ON ps.PatientSchemaId = pi.PatientSchemaId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ItemTimeline it ON pi.ItemTimelineId = it.ItemTimelineId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_Timeline t ON it.TimelineId = t.TimelineId WHERE p.ProtocolId = @ProtocolId ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- get patients with disease progression SELECT PatientId, PatientProtocolId, [1st Progression], [2nd Progression] FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pp.PatientId, pp.PatientProtocolId, c.StatusDate, c.StatusDisease, c.Status FROM Patients a INNER JOIN PatientProtocols pp ON a.PatientId = pp.PatientId INNER JOIN Status c ON a.PatientId = c.PatientId WHERE -- valid dates c.StatusDate IS NOT NULL -- specified disease AND c.StatusDisease = 'Prostate Cancer' -- specfied progression AND c.Status IN ('1st Progression','2nd Progression') ) a PIVOT ( MIN(StatusDate) FOR [Status] IN ([1st Progression],[2nd Progression]) ) AS a ) b ON a.PatientProtocolId = b.PatientProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT e.TimelineId FROM ProtocolMgr_Timeline a INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas b ON b.ProtocolSchemaId = a.ProtocolSchemaId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolVersions c ON b.ProtocolVersionId = c.ProtocolVersionId AND a.ItemIntervalType LIKE '%Recurring%' AND (a.VisitLabel LIKE 'AA (1)%' OR a.VisitLabel LIKE 'AA (2)%') INNER JOIN Protocols d ON c.ProtocolId = d.ProtocolId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_Timeline e ON a.ProtocolSchemaId = e.ProtocolSchemaId AND a.DisplayColumnPosition = e.DisplayColumnPosition AND a.PreStudySchemaItem = e.PreStudySchemaItem WHERE d.ProtocolId = @ProtocolId ) c ON a.TimelineId = c.TimelineId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT e.TimelineId FROM ProtocolMgr_Timeline a INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas b ON b.ProtocolSchemaId = a.ProtocolSchemaId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolVersions c ON b.ProtocolVersionId = c.ProtocolVersionId AND a.ItemIntervalType LIKE '%Recurring%' AND (a.VisitLabel LIKE 'C+AA%' OR a.VisitLabel LIKE 'AA%') INNER JOIN Protocols d ON c.ProtocolId = d.ProtocolId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_Timeline e ON a.ProtocolSchemaId = e.ProtocolSchemaId AND a.DisplayColumnPosition = e.DisplayColumnPosition AND a.PreStudySchemaItem = e.PreStudySchemaItem WHERE d.ProtocolId = @ProtocolId ) d ON a.TimelineId = d.TimelineId WHERE a.ItemTimelineId IS NOT NULL AND NOT ( [1st Progression] IS NOT NULL AND ProtocolArmDescription IS NOT NULL AND ScheduledDate IS NOT NULL AND ( (c.TimelineId IS NOT NULL AND ProtocolArmDescription LIKE 'Arm 1%' AND ScheduledDate > [1st Progression]) OR (d.TimelineId IS NOT NULL AND ProtocolArmDescription LIKE 'Arm 2%' AND ScheduledDate > [1st Progression]) )
)
